name: Jingle Cats VS Dogs
description:
Made for the Yogscast Jingle Game Jam. 

This jam was kinda rushed because I need to catch on uni work so it's bad quality but hopefully, you can have some fun playing. Was trying to do the jam last year but didn't have time either but at least i got a game out this year. Merry Christmas.

Jingle Cats VS Dogs is a sliding puzzle game where you have to navigate cats to the Santa hat without the dogs taking it or any cats and dogs touching each other. I struggled to think of what to do with the theme so you control both the cats and the enemy dogs (the old polar opposite enemy of cats).

Art Assets - https://www.kenney.nl/assets

Jingle Cats Songs - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCC_2lm24dgAnI1sGftAiESg
